name: textDraggableView(_:dragPreviewForLiftingItem:session:)
desc: Asks the delegate for the preview to show during the lift animation that happens when a user begins to drag an item from a text view.
declaration:
optional func textDraggableView(_ textDraggableView: UIView & UITextDraggable, 
      dragPreviewForLiftingItem item: UIDragItem, 
                        session: UIDragSession) -> UITargetedDragPreview?
